thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: EileenNJShore

author: EileenNJShore
title: EileenNJShore
text: I am very pleased with Thrift Books! They have a good selection of books to choose from, great deals, and a rewards program. I have bought used books locally in the past and found Thrift Books' condition ratings and definitions very accurate. I enjoy having a Wish List and being notified when an item becomes available. Ordering is fast and easy. The shipping is quick and the cost is excellent. I have no complaints, only kudos! Keep up the excellent work, Thrift Books! :)
